meanings.definition: The state or quality of being messy.
meanings.sent1: Her room's messiness made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand the messiness of my desk.
meanings.sent3: The messiness of the art project made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The messiness of the situation was like a tangled web.
meanings.sent5: The messiness of the kitchen was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The messiness of the living room was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: She tried to ignore the messiness of her closet.
meanings.sent3: The messiness of the party decorations added to the fun.
meanings.sent4: The messiness of the garden resembled a wild jungle.
meanings.sent5: The messiness of the office was a constant source of frustration.
